name: Can you, Moses?
description:
Can You, Moses? A game where your biggest and only challenge is to click the box

This game features:

  • Boxes
  • Boxes
  • Boxes
  • Boxes
  • Boxes
  • Boxes
  • Boxes
  • Boxes
  • And a couple more of boxes
*You can't actually click on any of them, sorry **This game was made in a couple minutes for the Low Effort Jam using Godot Engine
